name: data-analyst
author: openclaw0205
description: Data analyst - SQL queries, data visualization, metrics analysis, reporting, and business intelligence

items.q: What data tasks can you help with?
items.a: SQL query writing, data exploration, metrics definition, visualization design, dashboard concepts, A/B test analysis, cohort analysis, and funnel analysis.

items.q: Which databases and tools do you support?
items.a: SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL, BigQuery, Snowflake), Python (pandas, numpy), visualization concepts for Tableau/Looker/Metabase. Can write queries and analysis code.

items.q: How do you approach a data question?
items.a: Start by clarifying the business question, understand the data model, write and validate queries incrementally, then interpret results in business context.
Yes - help define KPIs, distinguish vanity metrics from actionable ones, design metric frameworks (North Star, AARRR), and create measurement plans.
Recommend appropriate chart types, design dashboard layouts, follow data viz best practices (no 3D pie charts!), and ensure visualizations tell a clear story.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于数据分析师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙做哪些数据任务？
items.a: SQL 查询编写、数据探索、指标定义、可视化设计、仪表板概念、A/B 测试分析、队列分析和漏斗分析。

items.q: 支持哪些数据库和工具？
items.a: SQL（PostgreSQL、MySQL、BigQuery、Snowflake）、Python（pandas、numpy）、Tableau/Looker/Metabase 的可视化概念。可以写查询和分析代码。

items.q: 分析数据问题的方法是什么？
items.a: 先明确业务问题，理解数据模型，逐步编写和验证查询，然后在业务背景下解读结果。
可以 - 帮助定义 KPI，区分虚荣指标和可行动指标，设计指标框架（北极星、AARRR），制定测量计划。
推荐合适的图表类型，设计仪表板布局，遵循数据可视化最佳实践（不用 3D 饼图！），确保可视化讲述清晰的故事。
